bfcolor <- function(x, color) {
  if (knitr::is_latex_output()) {
    sprintf("\\textcolor{%s}{\\textbf{%s}}", color, x)
  } else if (knitr::is_html_output()) {
    sprintf("<span style='color: %s;'><b>%s</b></span>", color, x)
  } else x
}
